Start Products Yellowpages Buyers My Center Home > Product Catalogue > Home Supplies > Kitchenware > Kitchen Accessories > Cooking&Serving Utensils Plastic Serving Tray Inquiry the manufacturer of Plastic Serving Tray Our new researched plastic serving tray is made out of the special type of PP material. It has high temperature resistance (it doesn't disfigure in boiling water), low temperature resistance (it doesn't crack in chill and freezing weather). Four kinds of models and many colors are available for choosing. It is widely used in fast food restaurant, and the dining-room of the school and enterprise.
Packing: Carton size: 410 x 300 x 15mm view large photo of Plastic Serving Tray
